certifications.title: CCNA Switching, Wireless and Routing Essentials

projects.name: Topic Modeling and Grouping Similar Documents
projects.description: Using Clustring algorithms Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) and K-means for grouping similar documents in large text corpora. The process involves preparation, Choosing K, Model Training and Interpretation. Both LDA and K-means have their strengths and are chosen based on the specific needs of the analysis, such as the desire for probabilistic topic distribution (LDA) or hard clustering (K-means).

projects.name: Metro Rail
projects.description: Program is implemented using Graph and Heap data structures.The graph has nodes and edges. Nodes represent a metro station that will be containing certain information regarding that station like its name, its metro corridor, and the lines which it connects. Edges (the connection between two nodes) represent the distance between the two stations and the cost of each edge will be equal to the distance between the two of its connecting stations(nodes). using different algorithms like Dijkstra, breadth-first search, depth-first search, etc, the shortest path between the source station and the destination station is determined, and accordingly, the fare is being calculated on the basis of it.

projects.name: Vehicle Detection and counting System
projects.description: Using OpenCV is to develop a robust and efficient solution for automated monitoring of traffic. Image Processing techniques by OpenCV to accurately detect vehicles. Ensure Real time processing, AWS IoT manages data transmission, Management and storage. MySQL is used for database system. User interface and dashboard using HTML and CSS.

experiences.description: Learned about the basic concepts of data science using python, basic ML and different clustering techniques. Created house price prediction model using AI and basic concepts of ML. Use Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) and K-means for topic modeling and grouping similar documents in large text corpora.

Helped in Improving the reach of the community using effective content for audience attraction. Wrote more than 10 articles for increasing the engagement of the website. Used technical skill such as HTML, CSS to optimize website functionality. Learned about web development projects.
